lead_paragraph: South Korean Kim Hyo-joo fired seven birdies in her opening 14 holes on her way to a two-shot victory in the season opener at the Pure Silk Bahamas LPGA Classic on Sunday.    Kim collected her third LPGA title in style, hitting every fairway and carding a seven-under-par 66 at the Ocean Club course on Paradise Island.

headline.print_headline: Kim Sets Sights on Olympics After Winning LPGA Opener
headline.main: Kim Sets Sights on Olympics After Winning LPGA Opener
